pages.text: Canari Wyverns can be found in swamp biomes. When tamed you can carry three of them on your shoulders and head.

pages.title: Taming
pages.text: These little guys are a bit tricky to tame, as they often fly away or attack when approached. To tame them, you have to chase them for a bit, and hope that they don't fly away...when they have enough of getting chased, they'll treaten you. This is when they can be fed. Just don't make any sudden movements!

pages.title: Shedding
pages.text: Canari Wyverns are able to pester foes by poisoning them. When resting they will sometimes shed their feathers.
